property.name: level
property.label: Alert level
property.description: Denotes the severity level of the alert.

property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: The title should be kept short and appears in bold.

property.name: content
property.label: Content
property.description: Alert message in plain text format.

property.name: link
property.label: Link
property.description: Link or call to action in Markdown link format.

property.name: dismissible
property.label: Dismissible
property.description: Adds a close button to dismiss the alert.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
